::DrillBit::

He looked at Bludgeon. 
"Yes, KitKat is nagotiating a Pred council on Earth. It would be her,
Aracnia, Megs, and Hell Beast. She is off talking with them now. The
base was invaded by a Maxi; I have him locked up in the Sci Lab now.
Then this guy..." He said, looking at DeepBlue.
"Shot up the base. Then he started zipping around above the base, like a
bat out of hell."
